programme.title: Major League Baseball
programme.desc: Highlights from Major League Baseball.

programme.title: Discovery Golf
programme.desc: A weekly show featuring the latest news from the world of golf.

programme.title: Onboard
programme.desc: A special onboard look at the Ocean Race, a yacht race around the world.

programme.title: Fishing: On the Bank
programme.desc: Angling magazine show presented by Rob Hughes and Andy Ford. In the last episode of the series, Rob's on a Christmas perch hunt and Andy examines some serious environmental issues.

programme.title: Premiership Speedway
programme.desc: Highlights round 11 of British Speedway as Sheffield Tigers face Belle Vue Aces.

programme.title: British Superbikes Motorcycle Racing
programme.desc: Highlights from round six of the 2025 British Superbike Championship, taking place at Thruxton Circuit in Hampshire.

programme.title: UEFA Super Cup
programme.desc: Action from the 2025 UEFA Super Cup as Champions League winners Paris Saint-Germain face Europa League winners Tottenham Hotspur at Bluenergy Stadium.

programme.title: Test Cricket
programme.desc: A review of the second Test between Zimbabwe and New Zealand.

programme.title: Tom Aspinall's Fight Lab
programme.desc: Heavyweight champion Tom Aspinall previews UFC 319, which will feature the middleweight title bout between Dricus du Plessis and Khamzat Chimaev.

programme.title: Fight Week
programme.desc: A preview of UFC 319 at the United Center in Chicago. Middleweight champion Dricus du Plessis will defend his title against Khamzat Chimaev in the main event.

programme.title: UFC Connected
programme.desc: Malcolm Wellmaker details leaving his blue-collar job for a full-time career in MMA. And, we join Brandon Moreno front row at UFC 317 for the flyweight title fight.

programme.desc: B+

programme.title: Dragon Tiger Gate
programme.desc: Tiger Wong is ambushed after taking the Lousha Plaque, but is saved by his brother and also befriends Turbo Shek. To avenge the death of Dragon Gate masters, the trio vow to defeat Lousha Clan leader.

programme.title: Don't Forget I Love You
programme.desc: Lu Yao has amnesia & wakes up every day remembering nothing from the day before. He meets psychotherapist Xing Yue & they fall in love despite knowing they have no future together.

programme.title: All's Well End's Well 97
programme.desc: Mr. Lo's sons prank Kung on his birthday with a fake lottery win, sparking chaos that unexpectedly heals old wounds and brings the quirky family closer together.

programme.title: Saving General Yang
programme.desc: Ekin Cheng, Vic Chow, Raymond Lam & Wu Chun, star in this tale that depicts how the seven sons of General Yang set out to rescue their father from an army of thousands.

programme.title: Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Five bounty hunters are tasked to track down the culprit of a series of bombings plaguing a hotel group in Bangkok. Can they solve the crime and finally collect the bounty?

programme.title: 77 Heartwarmings
programme.desc: After breaking up with Adam, Eva focuses on her career, but Adam is determined to win her back and makes 77 attempts to do so. The situation worsens when a Thai movie idol courts Eva

programme.title: The Grand Grandmaster
programme.desc: Disgraced by a lady fighter named Chun, the Grandmaster Fei Lung's unexpected romantic feelings towards her threatens to derail his win in the final fight he has challenged her to.

programme.title: Cesium Fallout
programme.desc: Hong Kong's survival is at risk due to a radiation leak. A fire brigade is assigned to stop cesium fallout by entering the radiation zone. Facing this unprecedented disaster, can they save the city?

programme.title: Detrimental
programme.desc: You Ji Ren is a visually impaired factory worker living in an island. After a hurricane cut them off from the outside world, a monster suddenly appears, turning whoever sees it into black shadows.

programme.title: Lonely Eighteen
programme.desc: Two best friends enter the Hong Kong Entertainment industry together in the 1980s but their fates differ. After a decade, their life choices lead them to two different paths in life.

programme.title: Z Storm
programme.desc: An ICAC investigator uncovers the huge fraud scheme of an organized corrupt group involving the government's $15 billion 'Care Fund'. He must fight against them to keep Hong Kong corruption free.

programme.title: Life Must Go On
programme.desc: When the midnight gymnasium programme for wayward teenage girls is at risk of closing down due to funding, social worker Yanki puts together a dodgeball team to compete in a match to save it.

programme.title: Stuntman
programme.desc: A washed-up stunt director is struggling to find his way in the changing film industry. He risks everything to make a comeback, while striving to mend his relationship with his estranged daughter.

programme.title: Hand Rolled Cigarette
programme.desc: In this Golden Horse winner starring Gordon Lam, a retired British-Chinese soldier becomes a target in a triad manhunt when he takes in a young South Asian drug mule.

programme.title: Where the Wind Blows
programme.desc: Two notorious corrupt police officers, Detectives Lui Lok and Nam Kong were found to build a corruption network between the triad and police, the ICAC begins to hunt them down to end their control.

programme.title: Dragon Master: Dragon Spell
programme.desc: The Dragon King is sealed away by the Dragon Master centuries ago and his daughter must travel back in time to kill the Dragon Master in order to reverse the act. But will she succeed?

programme.title: Table for Six 2
programme.desc: Bernard and Lung plan to get married when their eldest brother is away. Yet, the weddings spiral into a chaotic battleground with escalating family drama, creating a messy affair for all involved!

programme.title: The Wandering Earth 2
programme.desc: Set as a prequel, when the sun was found to be dying, humans build enormous engines on the Earth's surface to find a new home. To save the world, a group of young people decide to step forth.

programme.title: The White Storm 3: Heaven or Hell
programme.desc: Two undercover cops successfully develop a brotherly bond with a Thai drug lord. When the police busts the syndicate, the drug lord discovers that there is betrayal within his circle of trust...

programme.title: Confinement
programme.desc: A pregnant painter hires a confinement nanny, but inexplicable incidents start happening in the house as her one-month confinement begins, threatening her and her baby daughter...

programme.title: Ready o/r Knot
programme.desc: A couple who first meet at a wedding & have been together for five years, question the institution of marriage from opposing viewpoints. Should marriage always be the 'next step.'?

programme.title: The Hedgehog
programme.desc: Wang's odd behavior and quirky ideas make him a social outcast. When he meets his teenage nephew who is ashamed of his stutter, the two develop a special friendship through mutual understanding.

programme.title: Call Me Agent
programme.desc: Miu Ling, who dreams of becoming a secret agent, accidentally rescues an injured spy. He agrees to make her his apprentice, turning her upside down as she goes on madcap adventures.

programme.title: There Is No Escape From Fate
programme.desc: An innocent Hong Kong businessman is wrongfully imprisoned in a brutal multinational prison, and must escape the sadistic warden's torture to survive.

programme.title: The Way We Dance
programme.desc: When Fleur join her university's hip hop team, a journey begins which lead her into the heated world of dance competitions and a complicated romance.

programme.title: Teletubbies 25
programme.desc: Teletubbies stars iconic characters; Tinky Winky, Dipsy, Laa-Laa and Po. Their world is full of love and laughter as they explore Home Dome and the magical countryside of Teletubbyland through play. Familiar and beloved features from the original series return - The Noo-noo, Tubby Custard, Tubby Toast, Baby Sun, rabbits and the Voice Trumpets - along with some brand new surprises. Look out for th

programme.title: Work It Out Wombats! 27
programme.desc: The Wombats organize the Treeborhood Talent Show. Malik and Zeke create their own Brother Day. Zadie makes noise with her Really Big, Really Loud Noisy Thing. The Wombats build a giant snow globe for Zeke. Super invents a Huggyback rider. Malik perfects a magic trick. The Wombats turn their one bedroom into three.

Contestants get their musical memory challenged in a bid to win $1 million. They'll sing alongside the studio band, but suddenly the music will stop, and the words will disappear. Will they sing missing lyrics, or freeze under pressure?

The Founding Fathers established the pillars of freedom and democracy in the United States. But more than two centuries after their bold vision came to life, new information has emerged about the complexities, the agendas, and the secrets of these important historical figures. What truths have remained in the shadows about the men who formed America?

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE delivers the latest from Japan, Asia, and the rest of the world. While covering wide network of correspondents breaking news and developing stories, offering a perspective from this corner of the globe, a team of trusted anchors ties it all together to give you a picture of what's happening now, and what's ahead.
Andy Allen - Masterchef Australia Judge, alongside Michael Weldon and Courtney Roulston take you on a food journey to find the freshest produce and create inspiring recipes in the kitchen.

programme.title: Case File 96: Cult Justice 4
programme.desc: Featuring the chilling true stories of false prophets who thought they were above the law, Cult Justice explores the magnetic power of criminal cult leadersand the dramatic investigations that finally brought them to justice.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S2 38
programme.desc: Journey across the pond to London for heartwarming adventures with beloved British bear Paddington in this CG-animated series, which centers on a younger Paddington as he writes letters to Aunt Lucy celebrating the new things he has discovered through the day's exciting activities.

Robbie Cumming offers a personal take on life aboard his narrowboat home the Naughty Lass. The waterways explorer discovers the landscapes, towns and villages of the Midlands. He sets out on a challenging journey through summer, autumn and winter 2023/24 which takes him from Braunston, Northamptonshire through Birminghams maze of canals before heading south along the Grand Union Canal.

Season 3 of Australias real-life extreme version of hide and seek returns with an intense twist in the form of a large-scale heist. Nine pairs of ordinary Australians turn into shrewd Fugitives, starting with a robbery thatll see them stealth their way into Ballarat bank to steal up to $1 million dollars, before making their getaway to disappear without a trace. Humanity has launched satellites into outer space and submarines to the ocean floor, but the ground below Earths surface remains shrouded in mystery. Are there profound secrets buried beneath layers of rock, or hidden in vast caves? Can the subterranean world below shed light on humanitys past, or even its future?

ABC News' acclaimed series '20/20' has distinguished itself as one of the most esteemed news programs in broadcast journalism. Amid the heated, competitive environment of primetime entertainment, '20/20' has demonstrated its ability to consistently attract a significant segment of the viewing audience by offering viewers more choices and more chances to learn about the world around them.
